exam.question: Parents take a great interest in the ______ questions raised by their children.

answer.explain: 句意： 父母对孩子们提出的幼稚而又天真的问题怀有浓厚的兴趣。nasty： 污秽的； obscure： 模糊的； offensive： 讨厌的； 冒犯的。

sentences.sContent: Jim can be so naive sometimes.

remMethod.val: native(原始的， 土著的)去掉t → 比土著人的想法还要少一点 → 天真的， 幼稚的

trans.tranCn: 幼稚的； 天真的； 轻信的
trans.tranOther: not having much experience of how complicated life is, so that you trust people too much and believe that good things will always happen
